meanings.definition: Flammable material used for starting a fire.
meanings.sent1: Dry leaves and small sticks can be used as tinder to start a campfire.
meanings.sent2: He used some dry grass as tinder to light the barbecue.
meanings.sent3: The hiker forgot to bring tinder, so he couldn't start a fire to cook his meal.
meanings.sent4: Her anger was like tinder, ready to ignite at the slightest spark.
meanings.sent5: The old barn was filled with tinder, waiting for a careless match to set it ablaze.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that serves as a catalyst for a romantic relationship.
meanings.sent1: Their mutual friend acted as the perfect tinder, introducing them at the party.
meanings.sent2: In romantic comedies, the best friend often plays the role of the tinder for the main characters.
meanings.sent3: The matchmaking app claimed to be the ultimate tinder for finding true love.
meanings.sent4: His charming smile was the tinder that sparked her interest in him.
meanings.sent5: The romantic movie used a chance encounter as the tinder that brought the couple together.
